commit.message: Add ConfigFilesStasher that allows to save contents of jpackage build directories in external directory; Add clean_stashed_files.sh

8333568: Test that jpackage doesn't modify R/O files/directories

Reviewed-by: almatvee
OSVersionCondition: bugfix; CfgFile: minor; signing: fix entitlements
AdditionalLauncher.java: Fix AdditionalLauncher.PropertyFile to handle property expressions without "=".
Fix bug in PathGroup that resulted in copying "libapplauncher.so" in wrong location
Non-compliant fixes to keep old jpackage behavior
Don't add redundant elements to Info.plist when file associations are not specified
Added a stub to build "Info.plist" file for runtime installer

- Properly order tasks to create app image and config files for DEB to correctly calculate image size
 - Don't set category property on RPM if not explicitly specified.
Follow up fix after config files compared
Minor fix PostImageScriptTest to reflect the fact that jpackage doesn't create "packages" output directory beforehand.
Fix to make PostImageScriptTest pass on Linux
Order "post-image" hook after package config files created
Test the current directory of the post-image script is the root directory for app image.
Added MacPackage.app() returning MacApplication for convenience
PackageTest: fix to make it work when exe and msi packagings are both enabled and when PackageTest.Group is used
Fix TempKeychain and make it work with multiple keychains
Move MacBaseInstallerBundler.SIGNING_KEY_USER and MacBaseInstallerBundler.SIGNING_KEYCHAIN to MacFromParams
Bugfix for ErrorTest.testMacSigningIdentityValidation() and move "error.certificate.expired" to SigningIdentityBuilder
Fix AppImageSigner to not sign only the main launcher and sign additional launchers
Fix ExecutableRebrander. It never worked for embedding msi in exe installer
Fix JPackageCommand.macAppImageSigned() and move it together with JPackageCommand.signPredefinedAppImage() to MacHelper class
Strip ".jpackage.xml" from copied app image when permitted
Don't create app image file on macOS when not needed
All but "SigningPackageTest.test(false, false, true, UNICODE_INDEX)" signing tests pass
Add methods to ApplicationBuilder class to override launcher startup info
Remove redundant `Package` parameter from PackagingPipeline.copyAppImage(Package, AppImageDesc, AppImageDesc, boolean) method
Fix AppImageSigner: launchers should be signed
Fix ErrorTest `--app-version` tests failed on Windows
Move MacHelper.PListWrapper into PListReader and add unit tests
Parse xml without downloading external entities
Use XSLT to transform component .plist file
Basic tests pass with PKG packager
Fix DMG packaging: it didn't display destination directory when a dialog with copying DMG contents popped up.
Make MacDmgPackager.applyToPipeline(). It is internal and is supposed to be used by MacDmgPackager.Builder.
Add logic to ignore non-default install dir for DMG packager
Allow to read properties configured on PackageBuilder.
Added tests for DMG install dir. Fixed DMG bundler to report warning only when custom install dir differs from the default install dir.

Got rid of `params` in DMG bundler. Enhanced PackagingPipeline to do native packaging. Changed Linux, Windows, and DMG bunders to work inside of the pipeline. All tests but PKG packaging pass. PKG bundler compiles but has not been tested.
Tune FromParams.createApplicationBuilder() to work with macosx packages
Fix installation directory name for macos packages
Add RuntimeImageTest.testStrippedFiles() test to verify jmods and src.zip files are stripped from copied runtime
Make JavaOptionsEqualsTest test work if the default runtime is fake
Fix PathGroup to properly handle symbolic links copying
Create fake runtime in unique directory.
Add ImmutableDAG.dump() to dump graph in mermaid diagram format for debugging.
Reworked to add support for java.nio.file.CopyOption
Follow up for moving junit tests in "junit/share" folder
Make JavaOptionsTest pass when fake runtime is used with tests
Got rid of params (still need to clean validate()) in mac pkg bundler
Add signing config to mac pkg package.
Get rid of params in DMG bundler

8349509: [macos] Clean up macOS dead code in jpackage

Reviewed-by: asemenyuk
Remove TKit.assertEquals(boolean) and TKit.assertNotEquals(boolean). They belong to different branch
Fix AnnotationsTest to create test work directory in temp directory supplied by JUnit
Convert helpers-test tests to junit format. It is easier to debug them in IDE this way.
All tests pass on all platforms
Add DMG and PKG model interfaces
Bugfix of OSX packaging. All but ServiceTest tests pass
Use static ImmutableDAG.getNoOutgoingEdges() to get the array of future indexes for joining
Implemented PackagingPipeline on all platforms. All tests pass on Windows. SimplePackageTest pass on OSX.
Introduce PackagingPipeline. Converted windows packagers to use it. SimplePackageTest pass
Made DirectedEdge class public. Got rid of redundant ROOT_TASK.
Finally made it work. Added unit tests for better coverage.

- Can't guarantee scheduling of tasks in predictable order in ForkJoinPool. so rework sequential execution to not use executor services at all.
- Added a use case that fails. Some bug in TaskPipelineBuilder. Need to investigate
More unit tests added, better coverage

Get rid of Context and Action interfaces, use Runnable instead. This simplified implementation a bit. Updated pipeleine unit tests to use regexp in asserts of parallel executions. All tests pass. Fixed CountedCompleterBuilder based on the code coverage report.
Keep order of actions when scheduling. Works for sequential executor only.
Initial version of async action pipeline
Order packaging tests by packaging type. Helps to produce stable test logs
It works on osx. 61 test pass, 152 fail
Make PathUtils.normalizedAbsolutePath() and PathUtils.normalizedAbsolutePathString() null safe
Use correct default description for application which is the name of the application.

- Rework FromParams, WinFromParams, LinuxFromParams to use BundlerParamInfo.copyInto() and BundlerParamInfo.findIn() instead of BundlerParamInfo.fetchFrom() where applicable.
- Added scopes to AppImageBuilder.
- Added BundlerParamInfo.createBundlerParam() without ID.
- Simplified FileAssociationGroup.
Move CompositeProxyTunnel to shared code as it is used on both mac and linux
Remove redundant null checks form PackageFile
Implement Object.equals(), Object.hashCode(), and Object.toString() for CompositeProxy to make it IDE friendly
Reworked AppImageFile2 to get rid of Launcher.Unsupported, Application.Unsupported, and LauncherStartupInfo..Unsupported classes. Bugfixes in AppImageFile2.
Remove redundant Optional.ofNullable() call from WinLauncher.extraAppImageFileData() call.
Add missing parameter to Application.Stub() ctor call.
Reworked AppImageFile2 to get rid of Launcher.Unsupported, Application.Unsupported, and LauncherStartupInfo..Unsupported classes. Bugfixes in AppImageFile2.
Add clarification comment to AppImageLayout.runtimeDirectory(). Better handle defaults in builders.
Use the proper reference to application layout in AbstractAppImageBuilder
Add javadoc to PackagerException but it is misleading because of its current implementation
Part of the previous refactoring commit
Added a test for the sample used in javadoc of CompositeProxy class
Change signature of LinuxDebPackage.relativeCopyrightFilePath() to return Optional. LinuxDebPackage documented
Use java.util.Optional in model interfaces. Use UncheckedIOException where appropriate.
Add annotations to test cases in LicenseTest
Remove IOException from the "throws" list of RuntimeBuilder.createRuntime()
Remove redundant IOException from the "throws" list

- Don't exclude the "PATH" var from the environment when running app launchers in jpackage tests. Removal of the "PATH" var was a part of the JDK-8254920 fix. But this removal is redundant as JDK-8254920 was fixed by making jpackage app launcher not to look up for dll-s in the PATH. There are a few jpackage tests running app launchers without removing the PATH var from the environment - WinChildProcessTest, AppLauncherEnvTest. They proves that removal of the "PATH" var from the environment when testing app launchers is redundant.
 - Add support to remove any var from the environment in Executor class.
 - Add support for boolean property 'jpackage.test.clear-app-launcher-java-env-vars'. If set to true, "JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS" and "_JAVA_OPTIONS" will be removed from the environment when running app launchers. This is needed to support local jpackage test configurations when JRE used to run jpackage tests relies on these variables, but they should not be applied to runtimes of app launchers.
Fix JPackageCommand.ignoreFakeRuntime() to test externally supplied runtime instead of the runtime configured for the current jpackage command line.
Skip the RuntimeImageSymbolicLinksTest test on Windows when it is executed outside of jtreg. This is shared test and applies to multiple platforms but Windows.
Shorten names of variants of packages created by the WinInstallerUiTest test to avoid test failures when the test output directory is long enough that some paths exceed 260 characters.
Fix WinResourceTest to make it work with WiX v4.0+
Fix unit tests after merge with the master
Undo pointless changes to reduce the diff
Make AppImageFile and PackageFile classes package-private

Revert "Get rid of FunctionalUtils.java". Brings back Functional.java to make the diff easier to digest. It will be replaced with redoing c58b6587b3b4fb9c08afd27eacf139e0ed9afb83 commit in the next PR.

This reverts commit c58b6587b3b4fb9c08afd27eacf139e0ed9afb83.
8344550: Compilation error of jpackage test JPackageStringBundle.java source
Update TEST.properties with the new jpackage packages
Remove references to AppImageFile, PackageFile, and ApplicationLayout internal jpackage classes from the tests

- Split IOUtils into PathUtils, FileUtils, and XmlUtils classes in jdk.jpackage.internal.util package
- Moved jdk.jpackage.test.Functional in jdk.jpackage.internal.util.function package and moved internal classes to outer level
First iteration of Mac app image building and signing decoupled from "params"
Make AppImageBuilder more configurable and suitable for use on Mac
ExceptionWrapper -> ExceptionBox to simplify merge with master
Make CompositeProxy work correctly without the need to add default methods calling superinterface default methods in case of other interface method overrides.

- rename DynamicProxy -> CompositeProxy. Split CompositeProxy into CompositeProxySpec
 - add missing overrides to LinuxPackage and WinLauncher interfaces
 - move LinuxApplicationLayout.Tunnel into CompositeProxyTunnel so that it can be reused in DesktopIntegration
LinuxApplicationLayoutMixin should be public to make it work with AppImageLayout.toPathGroup()
SimplePackageTest is a pass on Linux
Get rid of Method.setAccessible() in DynamicProxy
DynamicProxy refactored to work with LinuxApplicationLayout. It still doesn't work completely.
Fix AppImageFileTest and make AppImageFile2 work with the current error message strings
Add test case to DynamicProxyTest for interface with static method(s)
Fix DynamicProxy after running all test cases in DynamicProxyTest
Narrow down the set of methods from which to build an argument for PathGroup ctor to non-static methods of types derived from AppImageLayout interface.
Add a test case for DynamicProxyTest
Added unit tests for DynamicProxy and fixed revealed bugs.
Remove LocalizedExceptionBuilderBase. All its functionality fits well in LocalizedExceptionBuilder. Patch TEST.properties to make jtreg tests work with the new jpackage package structure
Try mixin and dynamic proxy on Windows model. It works!
Remove unnecessary "public" modifier from OverridableResource class members
Fix ErrorTest failure when external runtime is specified in testing
Add FileAssociation.hasIcon(), FileAssociation.hasNonEmptyDescription(). Bugfix in WixAppImageFragmentBuilder to pass FileAssociationsTest.test(...) tests
Don't create Application twice when packaging a package
WixAppImageFragmentBuilder: don't write empty fa description in .wxs output
Remove wrong null ptr assert from FileAssociation.Stub ctor
Add BuildEnvBuilder, fix resource dir configuration in BuildEnv.createResource()
Define interface to parse and write app images and packages
Fix to make InOutPath test pass
Remove copied to FilUtils function from IOUtils. Get rid of dependency on AtomicReference from FilUtils.deleteRecursive()
Bugfix to make InstallDirTest.testCommon() pass on windows
Bugfix to make AppImagePackageTest test pass
Move check for null and empty string inside of validateIcon() method

- move OverridableResource back to jdk.jpackage.internal package where it belong
- move Application.createLauncherIconResource() to AppImageBuilder.createLauncherIconResource()
- add test if launchers have unique names to ApplicationBuilder.create()
Bugfix. SimplePackageTest is a pass on Windows

- rename `Impl` classes in `Stub`
 - seal Proxy methods
 - seal `Stub` classes that are not records
Make check for main jar in the app image optional
Split ApplicationLayout into AppImageLayout, ApplicationLayout, and RuntimeLayout.
Clean model interfaces from implementation details. Added a number of builder class to create launcher, application, package, etc. model types.

- Clustered classes from jdk.jpackage.internal package into jdk.jpackage.internal.cli, jdk.jpackage.internal.util, jdk.jpackage.internal.util.function, jdk.jpackage.internal.util.xml, and jdk.jpackage.internal.model packages
- Reworked file associations initialization
Add a package with jackage CLI. Ready for JOpt integration

- move Package to jpk.jpackage.model package
- move Package.StandardPackageType and Package.PackageType to outer level

- split Package.packageFileName() into Package.packageFileName(), Package.packageFileSuffix(), and Package.packageFileNameWithSuffix().
- fix bug in Package.defaultInstallDir() on windows.
- Use I18N.format().
- Fix WinScriptTest for exe installer.

Revert "Get rid of Linux-specific `LINUX_APPLAUNCHER_LIB` in ApplicationLayout"

This reverts commit e2bb391eef7aa7ce2bcb2664f2d141a057922937.
Get rid of Linux-specific `LINUX_APPLAUNCHER_LIB` in ApplicationLayout
PackageFile.getPathInAppImage() and AppImageFile2.getPathInAppImage() will return null if called on app layout without `app` subdirectory (runtime image)

Make PackagerException use I18N class to access l10n data. Fixes the issue that PackagerException can pull values from `jdk.jpackage.internal.resources.MainResources` resource bundle only instead of all jpackage resource bundles
Move `error.invalid-install-dir` key from LinuxResources.properties to shared MainResources.properties
Get rid of dependency on jdk.internal.util.OperatingSystem.

- Get rid of `params` in Windows and Linux code. Only marginal usages are left to clean.
- Make AppImageBuilder class final. Its behavior is still configurable.
- Use AppImageBuilder in all Windows and Linux bundlers.
- Get rid of copying app image when building Windows and Linux packages.

- Add default implementation to PathGroup.TransformHandler interface
- Don't create .package file in app image when bundling msi. Create it in config dir. This lets keep app image R/O
Make AppImageFile2 class package private and add function to get path to the file in the application layout
Added Launcher.defaultIconResourceName() and static Launcher.validateIcon() to validate launcher icon
Added `ConfigException.build()` to simplify building ConfigException instances
Check main jar is added to the app image at the correct location
Split Launcher.executableName() into Launcher.executableName(), Launcher.executableSuffix(), and Launcher.executableNameWithSuffix(). Fix DotInNameTest.java test

- All rpm tests pass.
- Added AppImageFile2 with the same functionality as AppImageFile but without `params` and hardcoded specifics of OSX (signing). It should eventually replace AppImageFile.
- Added AppImageBuilder to build app image without `params`. LinuxAppImageBuilder2 is derived from AppImageBuilder and shoudl eventually replace LinuxAppImageBuilder.
- Added missing Unsupported classes.
- Added missing properties to Launcher and Application interfaces.
- renamed Application.allLaunchers() into Application.launchers().
- default implementation of Application.additionalLaunchers() will never return `null`.
Fix for `--app-image` scenario. More strict checks of the values of `Icon` and `Exec` keys
Add `thpws IOException` as ApplicationFromParams.create() can throw exceptions of this type
Use absolute paths when filtering module paths
Fix to make AddLShortcutTest rpm test pass
Added Package.packageLayout(). Now there are three app layouts for the package: source app image layout, layout of app image for packaging, and layout of installed app image
Disable better default launcher description to pass existing tests
Check the value of `Exec` key in .desktop file references one of app launchers
Make AppAboutUrlTest test pass for rpm packaging

- Encapsulate building of a runtime by jlink or copying from the external directory in RuntimeBuilder interface
- Add ctor to BundlerParamInfo class and make StandardBundlerParam class a storage for standard parameters
- Add defaults to Application/Package and derived interfaces
Got rid of most "params" in Linux packaging.
Current state of Linux port of "no params" project

Move common code for proxy classes in ProxyBase.
Remove Launcher#version() and Launcher#release().
Turn Package.PackageType into interface and add Package.StandardPackageType enum for known packaging types. This is to allow adding custom packaging types at runtime
SimplePackageTest is a pass on Windows
